title: Yellow River Basin
btntext: The division of the Yellow River
The Worries of the Yellow River
text: In the upper reaches of the Yellow River, grassland degradation and desertification are serious.
In the middle reaches of the Yellow River, soil erosion is severe, and the sediment content of the Yellow River is also large.
The ridges of the Yellow River Basin occur in the upper and lower reaches, such as Ningxia, Inner Mongolia, Shandong, etc.
In the lower reaches of the Yellow River, due to the massive siltation of sediment, the ground is overhanging.
Longyangxia Hydropower Station, the first large-scale cascade power station in the upper reaches of the Yellow River, is known as the Yellow River
Lijiaxia Hydropower Station is the third-largest hydropower station in the development of water elevators in the upper reaches of the Yellow River.
Liujiaxia Hydropower Station, China's first million kilowatt-class hydropower station.
Qingtongxia Hydropower Station, the earliest pier-type hydropower station in China.
Hukou Waterfall is the second largest waterfall in China, the largest yellow waterfall in the world.
